abilities.name: Brood Progenitor
abilities.rule: While a friendly **TERMAGANTS** unit is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[LETHAL HITS]** ability.

abilities.name: Spawn Termagants
abilities.rule: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly **TERMAGANTS** unit within 6" of this model and return up to D3+3 destroyed models to that unit. A **TERMAGANTS** unit cannot be selected for this ability more than once per phase.
